title: chestshop商店插件的问题
author: 残疾
txt_content:
chestshop这个商店插件怎么搞那种不用箱子的出售
就是系统出售

replies.author: Lahmsworld
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Lahmsworld 于 2013-8-29 14:39 编辑 
残疾 发表于 2013-8-29 14:31 
牌子会弹出去 不可以
那就填admin shop
还不行的话检查一下你的插件是不是被修改了插件说明原文:

What is an Admin Shop?
Admin shop is the shop that doesn't require a chest, because it has infinite stock.
If you sell to it, the items will disappear, and if you buy from it, items will magically appear.
To create one, you have to be Admin/OP. Just put "Admin Shop" (or anything specified in config file) on the first line of the sign.

replies.author: Lahmsworld
replies.txt_content: 写一个和普通的商店一样的牌子，但第一行不要留空，写admin试试

replies.author: 残疾
replies.txt_content:
Lahmsworld 发表于 2013-8-29 14:26 
写一个和普通的商店一样的牌子，但第一行不要留空，写admin试试
牌子会弹出去 不可以

replies.author: 残疾
replies.txt_content:
Lahmsworld 发表于 2013-8-29 14:37 
那就填admin shop
还不行的话检查一下你的插件是不是被修改了
好了，成功了，感谢你的回答
